D.Description: # 1. Cortical parcellation (D): Desikan-Killiany cortical parcellation (Desikan et al, 2006).
Name: aparc

X.Description: # 1. Cortical parcellation (X): Destrieux cortical parcellation (Destrieux et al, 2009).
Name: aparc.a2009s

T.Description: # 1. Cortical parcellation (T): Desikan-Killiany-Tourville cortical parcellation (Klein and Tourville, 2012).
Name: atlas-dkt_desc-40regions

B.Description: # 1. Cortical parcellation (B): Brainnetome cortical parcellation (Fan et al, 2016).
Name: atlas-brainnetome

L.Description: # 1. Cortical parcellation (L): Lausanne multi-scale cortical parcellation (Symmetric version of Cammoun et al, 2012).
Name: atlas-laus2018_desc-scale1
atlas-laus2018_desc-scale2
atlas-laus2018_desc-scale3
atlas-laus2018_desc-scale4
atlas-laus2018_desc-scale5

H.Description: # 1. Cortical parcellation (H): HCP-MMP1 cortical parcellation (Glasser et al, 2016).
Name: atlas-hcpmm_desc-5p3
atlas-hcpmm_desc-6p0
atlas-hcpmm_desc-7p1

V.Description: # 1. Cortical parcellation (V): von Economo cortical parcellation (von Economo and Koskinas, 1925).
Name: atlas-voneconomo

Y.Description: # 1. Cortical parcellation (Y): Yeo cortical parcellation (Yeo et al, 2011).
Name: atlas-yeo2011_desc-7networks
atlas-yeo2011_desc-17networks

F.Description: # 2. Subcortical parcellation (F): Aseg subcortical parcellation (Fischl et al, 2002).

R.Description: # 2. Subcortical parcellation (R): FIRST subcortical parcellation (Patenaude et al, 2011).

F.Description: # 3. Thalamus parcellation (F): Aseg subcortical parcellation (Fischl et al, 2002).

I.Description: # 3. Thalamic parcellation (I): Thalamic parcellation (Iglesias et al, 2018).

M.Description: # 3. Thalamic parcellation (M): Thalamic parcellation (Najdenovska and Aleman-Gomez et al, 2018).

R.Description: # 3. Thalamus parcellation (R): FIRST thalamus parcellation (Patenaude et al, 2011).

F.Description: # 4. Amygdala parcellation (F): Amygdala parcellation (Fischl et al, 2002).

I.Description: # 4. Amygdala parcellation (I): Amygdala nuclei parcellation (Iglesias et al, 2017).

R.Description: # 4. Amygdala parcellation (R): FIRST amygdala parcellation (Patenaude et al, 2011).

F.Description: # 5. Hippocampus parcellation (F): Hippocampus parcellation (Fischl et al, 2002).

I.Description: # 5. Hippocampus parcellation (I): Hippocampus subfields parcellation (Iglesias et al, 2015).

H.Description: # 5. Hippocampus parcellation (H): Head body and tail of the hippocampus (Iglesias et al, 2015).

F.Description: # 6. Hypothalamus parcellation (F): Hypothalamus parcellation using the Ventral DC (based on in-house protocol).

I.Description: # 6. Hypothalamus parcellation (I): Hypothalamus parcellation (Iglesias et al, 2019).

F.Description: # 7. Cerebellum parcellation (F): Cerebellum parcellation (Fischl et al, 2002).
# 8. Brainstem parcellation (F): Brainstem parcellation (Fischl et al, 2002).

I.Description: # 8. Brainstem parcellation (I): Brainstem parcellation (Iglesias et al, 2018).

F.Description: # 9. GyralWM parcellation (F): Gyral white matter parcellation based on Desikan (Desikan et al, 2006).
